articles.content: Weve already got a glimpse of a couple of PlayStation 5 games courtesy of Godfall and Quantum Error, but with coronavirus scuppering its plans, Sony has been largely tight-lipped about its next-gen plans. Despite not showing much more than the Japanese giant,… [+1062 chars]

articles.author: Rob Thubron
articles.title: Malwarebytes steps into the VPN space with WireGuard-based service - TechSpot
articles.description: Available now for Windows 7 and higher—Mac, Android, iOS, and Chrome OS are coming soon—Malwarebytes Privacy costs $59.99 per year. You can also get it bundled with a 1-year license of Malwarebytes Premium for $89.99, saving buyers $49.99. Both options…
articles.content:
In brief: Malwarebytes is joining the list of antivirus companies that also offer a VPN. Called Malwarebytes Privacy, the service uses a newer and faster protocol: WireGuard. 
Available now for Windows 7 and higherMac, Android, iOS, and Chrome OS are coming … [+1527 chars]

articles.author: Dieter Bohn
articles.title: Making macOS run well on ARM processors isn’t the hard part - The Verge
articles.description: We finally have a report confirming Apple is actively working on ARM processors for Macs. But as Dieter Bohn explains, just getting macOS and Apple’s own apps running  on it isn’t enough. Processor transitions are hard!
articles.content:
Less surprise will mean more delight
Photo by Nilay Patel / The Verge
Mark Gurman at Bloomberg has the confirmation weve all be waiting for: Apple will reportedly use a 12-core 5nm ARM processor in a 2021 Mac. Theres plenty of time to work out the details, … [+11995 chars]
